Translations.Text: Gxi Does ever occur those hered ter previous generaci ke ni ni pun them their pek sigel their kor kauxz them turn surd
Ni narrate vi histori those communities their messengers ir them klar proofs ili ne est kred en ki ili rejected antaux! DI TIEL SIGEL KOR disbelievers
Ni trov ke plej de them disregard their covenant ni trov plej de them wicked
Post (those messengers) ni send Moses our sign Pharaoh his popol ili transgressed Not consequences por des wicked
Moses dir O Pharaoh mi est messenger el Lord univers
est incumbent upon me mi ne dir DI escept truth! Mi ven vi sign el your Lord let Infan Israel ir
Li dir vi hav sign tiam produkt gxi vi est truthful
Li jxet down his stab gxi torn into tremendous serpent
Li sorb his man gxi est blank al beholders
